officialTitle: Effects of Long Acting Bronchodilators on CARDiac Autonomic Nervous System Control in Patients With COPD
inclusionCriteria:
* patients with FEV1 / FVC \<70%
* Must have minimum age of 50 Years
* Must have maximum age of 75 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* beta blocker
* supraventricular rhythm disorder
* previous history of respiratory disease other than COPD
* diabetes
* autonomic dysfunction
* dysautonomia
* renal failure
* long-term oxygen therapy
* history of psychiatric illness
